objects.text:
• Adjustable Height (19" to 24.5")
• Hidden Storage Compartment
• Multiple Storage Shelves

product_details.description: Overall size of coffee table: 41”L x 19.5”W x 19”-24.5 H. Adjustable Height: Coffee table´s innovative design with hidden compartment and lift tabletop can be adjusted vertically from 19’’ to 24.5 to meet your different demands of desired height. Just lifting it effortlessly, there is extra storage room provided. And the stability will also be guaranteed while adjusting. Storage Construction: Made of chipboard, solid wood and metal piece, Tangkula coffee table features large storage rooms with 3 divided storage design, which can well accommodate your various kinds of accessories or stuffs, such as your notebooks, glasses or other things. Practicable Design: Our coffee table is widely applied in office or home as a perfect coffee table or living room furniture for its spacious work area. Its compact structure and beautiful texture can surprisingly highlight your office or home decor, perfect for your office, living room, or study. Brand - Tangkula ** Product Dimensions - 19"D x 41"W x 24.5"H ** Maximum Weight Recommendation - 220 Pounds ** Color - White ** Product Care Instructions - Wipe with Dry/Damp Cloth **

banner_details:
This banner design features a visually balanced layout split into two sections: the left half highlights promotional content, while the right half showcases a product image of a coffee table with modern functionality. The left section includes four text layers: a bold, uppercase multi-line **heading** highlighting the product type, a smaller **subheading** offering a value statement, a compact **description** detailing features, and a prominent **price** tag in large font. Centered beneath these is a clear **CTA button** ("CALL TO ACTION") with contrasting white text on a dark rectangle. The right side holds the **product_image**, scaled slightly up for prominence. Decorative lines and abstract shapes subtly embellish the background.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream (#F5F1EA) – Background
- Beige (#E6D5C1) – Left panel background
- Dark Brown (#5D4037) – Heading text, lines, CTA background
- Medium Brown (#7D5A50) – Subheading, price text
- White (#FFFFFF) – CTA text
product_color: The product image showcases a modern and minimalist coffee table with a lift-top design blending functionality and aesthetics. The primary colors include a clean **white (#FFFFFF)** base that enhances brightness and simplicity, contrasted with a rich **walnut brown (#6E4B3A)** tabletop, adding warmth and elegance. Accents of **light gray (#D8D8D8)** are subtly present in the legs and compartments, offering a neutral balance. The decor items, such as books and boxes, introduce muted tones like **soft green (#8A9C84)** and **beige (#D3BFA3)**, giving a homely touch. These colors are well-blended yet distinct, ideal for a banner focusing on modern, functional interior aesthetics.
